snippet.title: Guardians - Early Access - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Guardians is an innovative VR game that blends FPS and RTS genres on a Sci-fi setting. Inspired by StarCraft and Halo, we designed the game to be easy to play but hard to master. 
The game has:

• A single player campaign consisting of 12 levels (in 3 different planets), 7 of them available at launch. 
• Multiplayer Co-Op and PvP modes
• Cross-play between PCVR and Quest

Buy it today on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1481440/Guardians_VR/
Or SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/2804/guardians-vr
